16 April 2010

Websites for WIC/XMP, EXIF, IPTC

by alvachien

首先，一个值得收藏的个人Blog: http://www.tassography.com/。看得偶自己都又想做一个自己的了。
Resources websites:
EXIF official website: http://www.exif.org
IPTC official website: http://www.iptc.org/
XMP related: http://www.adobe.com/products/xmp/
Development related websites:
WIC Sub-forum in MSDN forums: http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/windowswic/threads?page=1
System.Windows.Media.Imaging namespace (.NET): http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-US/library/ms608877(v=VS.85).aspx
WIC (Managed edition): http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms748873%28v=VS.85%29.aspx
WIC (Unmanaged edition): http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee719902%28v=VS.85%29.aspx
By Alva Chien 2010.04.16
